title: Cardoons with Parmigiano-Reggiano
introduction: Cardoons are a delightful vegetable that impart a unique, slightly bitter flavor. This recipe combines cardoons with the richness of butter and the savory taste of Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese, creating a dish that is both comforting and elegant.
instructions: 1. Prepare the cardoons as in Fried Cardoons through step 2.
2. Place a rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 450°F. Generously butter a 13 × 9 × 2– inch baking pan.
3. Arrange the cardoon pieces in the pan. Dot with the butter and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Scatter the cheese over the top.
4. Bake 10 to 15 minutes, or until the cheese is slightly melted. Serve hot.
